   time  GNU grep  ripgrep  xs grep -j 1  xs grep  xs grep -j  \
0  Wall     6.542    1.526         4.080    1.296       0.894   
1   CPU     6.538    1.522         4.092    4.758       6.158   

   xs grep -j 1 --no-mmap  xs grep --no-mmap  xs grep -j --no-mmap  
0                   3.784              1.816                 2.000  
1                   5.712              6.216                 9.466
